resources.string: Below is your authentication code, to enter when signing in to Cryptodash:
To use the Authenticator, register your Cryptodash account by scanning the provided QR code or manually entering the provided key.
Verify the following information is correct:
Enter your email address associated with your Cryptodash account and the provided key.
An error has occurred - please consider reporting this.
Sorry, an unexpected error has occurred that we can't recover from. We would greatly appreciate you reporting this error to us so that we can fix it.
Thank you for reporting the error!
